text:
PassFort | Fullstack Developer | London, UK | Onsite | Full-time | £50-£80K depending on experience + equity

At PassFort, our vision is to solve trust in the digital economy, starting with regulated businesses.

We work with an awesome stack - Javascript (ES6), React, Redux front end; Python, Rust back end; microservice based architecture built on top of Kubernetes and Google’s Cloud Platform.

Team - We're 12 people strong, have solid funding behind us, and looking to double over the next year

Values - Trust, Empowerment, Growth!

You can see more detail here - https://www.workable.com/j/F873F5B932
